thread.title: EDITION and Bacardi launch the first trolley cocktail service at Virgin Atlantic’s Heathrow Clubhouse
thread.title_full: EDITION and Bacardi launch the first trolley cocktail service at Virgin Atlantic’s Heathrow Clubhouse

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: EDITION and Bacardi launch the first trolley cocktail service at Virgin Atlantic’s Heathrow Clubhouse
text:
EDITION and Bacardi launch the first trolley cocktail service at Virgin Atlantic’s Heathrow Clubhouse EDITION and Bacardi launch the first trolley cocktail service at Virgin Atlantic’s Heathrow Clubhouse Details Category: Airport & Airline   14:30 Luxury hotel brand, EDITION, has partnered with Bacardi to launch the first cocktail trolley service at Virgin Atlantic’s London Heathrow Clubhouse. The ‘at your table’ afternoon cocktail service will showcase EDITION’s signature cocktails from the three hotel locations – London, New York and Miami Beach. 
Guests will be able to sit back, relax and watch as the cocktails are created in front of them from the bespoke drinks trolley. The partnership will run throughout July and guests will be offered a complimentary drink at the hotels once they arrive at their destination. THE LONDON EDITION
